name: RD DEV Solutions
tagline: Web solutions for startups and enterprises
description:
RD DEV Solutions is custom software development company, founded in 2012 in Ukraine.
We develop software solutions that solve the most challenging problems today’s enterprises face.
Whether we are building MVP for an innovative startup or enhancing existing software product for established enterprise, the more complex and technology-intensive the  project, the more we like working on it!
 
We build software solutions for startups, small and medium businesses worldwide.
Our services:
1.Software development
Web solutions
Mobile development
MVP
Existing Software Improvement
Cloud solutions

Software Architecture,
Product Improvement,
Cloud  consulting
3. Dedicated Team
